title: On the antimicrobial properties and endurance of eugenol and 2-phenylphenol functionalized sol-gel coatings
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Ana Suárez-Vega, Gemma Berriozabal, Juan Perez de Iriarte, Jaione Lorenzo, Noelia Álvarez, Santiago Dominguez-Meister, Sara Insausti, Edurne Rujas, Jose L. Nieva, Marta Brizuela, Iñigo Braceras
